Type.Text: Preparation: 20-40 minutes Start #2 first; warm up, cool down Flight time above 20%/20 minutes of scheduled requires review
Preparation: 20-50 minutes Start #1 first; OETD, warm up, OETA, cool down Flight time above 30%/45 minutes of scheduled requires review Must have at least 1000kg fuel on landing

Preparation: 15-40 minutes Start #1 first; OETD, warm up, OETA, cool down Pause in flight requires PIREP comment Must have at least 2000kg of fuel on landing Worth pushing flights up just above certain hour marks
